criteria.name: Professional Tone & Style
criteria.description: Maintains authoritative, formal, and client-focused voice throughout. Uses proper salutations, professional terminology, and appropriate register.

criteria.name: Structural Completeness
criteria.description: Includes all required sections: Header, Opening, Summary Understanding, Statement of Work (phases), Terms of Agreement, Signature Block, and Attachment A (Standard Terms & Conditions).

criteria.name: Specificity & Quantification
criteria.description: Uses specific, quantifiable details with parenthetical numbers. Avoids vague language. Includes concrete deliverables, timelines, and data requirements.

criteria.name: Client-Centric Focus
criteria.description: Clearly articulates client challenges, frames services around client needs, and demonstrates understanding of client's operational context.

criteria.name: Clarity & Organization
criteria.description: Information is well-organized with clear headers, bulleted lists for complex information, and logical flow between sections. Fee structure is clearly presented.

criteria.name: Legal & Formatting Precision
criteria.description: Standard Terms & Conditions are complete and properly formatted. Proper markdown structure maintained. Legal language is precise and professional.

passing_message: Proposal meets professional standards and is ready for client submission
failing_message: Proposal needs refinement in tone, completeness, or legal precision before submission
